meanings: bear, (참다) endure tolerate, put up with, (주로 부정문·의문문에 쓰여) stand

vlive.korean: [외로움을 견디지 못하고 결국!] [She couldn't endure the loneliness!] View video TRENDY TV(트렌디 티비) : [사다드림 시즌2] 태국에서 도연의 결혼생활은 막장?_11회
내가 그 분위기를 견디지 못했었지. I couldn't handle it. 듣기 View video UNIQ : 유니크 늬우스 2탄 빠밤
이런 부분이 잘 견디지 못하는 지경에 이르렀습니다. My body can't take stiffness anymore. 듣기 View video 10PM : [올가tv프리뷰] 이유주의 삭신이 쑤실때
vlive.english: My body can't take stiffness anymore.

vlive.korean: 남들과 다른 것을 견디지 못하죠. you're bitten by a zombie. They can't stand it if you're different. 듣기 View video 10PM : [10pm2 목] 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!
vlive.english: you're bitten by a zombie. They can't stand it if you're different.

vlive.korean: 그러니까 이런 압박감도 견디지 못하고 야자타임 추천을 쓰셨어요? You recommended to do "ya-ja time" when you couldn't handle this pressure? 듣기 View video EXID : <6월 해주세요 - 야자타임 편>
vlive.english: You recommended to do "ya-ja time" when you couldn't handle this pressure?

examples.korean: She failed to withstand the stresses and strains of public life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 사람들에게 노출된 생활에서 오는 스트레스와 압박감을 견디지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She failed to withstand the stresses and strains of public life. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The ice will not sustain your weight. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 얼음이 너의 체중을 견디지 못할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ice will not sustain your weight. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The ice is too thin to bear your weight. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 얼음이 너무 얇아 네 체중을 견디지 못한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ice is too thin to bear your weight. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The sea wall was not proof against the strength of the waves. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 해안 방벽은 파도의 힘을 견디지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sea wall was not proof against the strength of the waves. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Before winter, we wrapped the trunks of frost-tender trees in the garden. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 겨울이 닥치기 전에, 추위를 견디지 못하는 정원 나무들에 옷을 입혔다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
